ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We deal with evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We deal with sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus do We treat the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is how We deal with the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Certainly, that is how We deal with the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely thus do We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so We do with the sinners;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thus deal We with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that is how We deal with evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! in this wise We deal with the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, that is how We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily that is how We shall deal with Sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly, that is how We deal with Al-Mujrimun (polytheists, sinners, criminals, the disobedient to Allah, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We shall deal with the evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We deal with the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:34] Indeed so, in the same way that We deal with these, We deal with sinners, other than these, in other words, We chastise both of them the followers and those who were followed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thus deal We with the guilty) thus We deal with the idolaters.
